title: For Sale/Trade: T205 McLean, T206 Congalton
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: For Sale/Trade: T205 McLean, T206 Congalton
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

   It's been a while since I added another card to my C46 set, so I figured I'd try to trade a couple of cards towards that effort.  If anyone has any C46s from those that I need (see below) and is interested in in trading for any of the cards below, shoot me an email (richard@richardarmstrong.ca).  Alternatively, if I can't trade, I'd sell these instead.

Regards,

Richard.

C46s I need:
------------
3, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15, 18, 19, 20, 21, 23, 24, 25, 31, 34, 35, 37, 39, 40, 41, 43, 44, 45, 48, 49, 51, 52, 54, 56, 59
61, 62, 63, 64, 69, 72, 73, 74, 76, 77, 78, 79, 88, 89, 90

See the links below for massive scans:

[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/ForTrade_Fronts.gif[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/ForTrade_Backs.gif[/IMG]
